data.title: Possessed

data.text:
Possessed is a 1947 American film directed by Curtis Bernhardt. It stars Joan Crawford as an emotionally unstable woman recounting how she ended up in a mental hospital.

Appearances[]

10:49 p.m. Nurse Louise Howell (Joan Crawford) comes to Carol Graham's (Geraldine Brooks) home. From her bedroom, Carol makes disdainful remarks. Carol picks up a tray and goes into the bedroom. A clock outside the bedroom displays the time.

11:25 p.m. A clock in Louise's bedroom shows the time.

11:26 p.m. Louise walks back and forth in her bedroom.

11:27 p.m. Louise looks at the ticking clock next to her bed. She stops its pendulum but hears a dripping sound. She gets out of bed, shuts the window, and leaves her bedroom.
